question:
Which among the following is/ are state political parties of Odisha?
1. Odisha Communist Party
2. Biju Janata Dal (BJD)
3. Kosal Kranti Dal (KKD)
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: State political parties of Odisha- Odisha Communist Party (Leader- Ajeya Rout), Biju Janata Dal (CM- Biju Patnaik), Kosal Kranti Dal (KKD)
